meanings.definition: A general summary or survey of a subject.
meanings.sent1: The teacher provided an overview of the upcoming science project.
meanings.sent2: Let me give you a quick overview of the main points.
meanings.sent3: The overview of the movie plot left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her speech gave an overview of the challenges we will face.
meanings.sent5: The overview of the city skyline from the hill was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A brief description or explanation of something.
meanings.sent1: The brochure included a helpful overview of the tourist attractions.
meanings.sent2: Before we start, let me provide a brief overview of the project.
meanings.sent3: The overview of the new recipe made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: His overview of the situation was like a light bulb turning on.
meanings.sent5: The overview of the painting's history added depth to my understanding.
